name: root
description: React container that will auto scroll to bottom

scripts.docker:up: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --parallel && docker-compose up --scale chromium=2
scripts.docker:watch: nodemon --exec "docker-compose build --quiet -- webserver && docker-compose kill webserver && docker-compose rm --force --stop webserver && docker-compose up --detach -- webserver" --ext html,js,json,map --on-change-only --watch __tests__ --watch packages/component/dist
scripts.precommit:component: cd packages && cd component && bun run precommit --
